text.name: text_info
text.text:
[b][color=#FFFF00]The real award description[/b] * You can get reward puzzle in the following ways: Puzzle bubbles, Lucky Spin, Pick cards.
[color=#FFFF00]Puzzle bubbles [/color] * 6 kind of bubbles are revealed. * Click one bubble each time, you can obtain it by watching an advertisement. * The showing frequency of each kind of puzzle bubbles are as follows : MacBook Pro 1.7% iPad Pro 256GB 8.9% PlayStation 5 3.2% Galaxy Z Flip3 5G 2.3% Nintendo Switch 32GB 13.3% Chanel Maxi Bag 2.1% AirPods Max 4.2% Nick Air Jordan 1 3.2% Dyson Supersonic 12.9% Oculus Quest 2 11.2%
[color=#FFFF00]Lucky Spin [/color] * 6 kind of bubbles are showed up.Click the refresh button to switch the rewards * Spin it, you can randomly get one of the 6 rewards * The ratio of winning for each reward are as follows: MacBook Pro 1.1% iPad Pro 256GB 2.1% PlayStation 5 4.3% Galaxy Z Flip3 5G 5.2% Nintendo Switch 32GB 5.1% Chanel Maxi Bag 11.3% AirPods Max 6.5% Nick Air Jordan 1 3.9% Dyson Supersonic 7.8% Oculus Quest 2 4.3%
[color=#FFFF00]Pick cards[/color] * Trigger pick cards in Bingo game * The ratio of winning for each reward are as follows: MacBook Pro 1.9% iPad Pro 256GB 3.4% PlayStation 5 6.6% Galaxy Z Flip3 5G 17.2% Nintendo Switch 32GB 11.3% Chanel Maxi Bag 9.1% AirPods Max 9.3% Nick Air Jordan 1 1.2% Dyson Supersonic 9.2% Oculus Quest 2 1.6%
